"A picnic basket that doubles as a portable camping stove." This idea is great for those who love to camp and cook on the go. The stove can be easily attached to the basket and used to heat up hot dogs, marshmallows, or even a cup of coffee.

"A picnic basket that transforms into a portable grill." This idea is perfect for those who love to barbecue and want to take their grilling on the go. The basket can be easily converted into a grill with the addition of a grill grate and charcoal.

"A picnic basket with built-in ice packs." This idea is great for keeping your food and drinks cold while on a picnic. The ice packs can be easily removed and recharged using a battery or solar panel.

"A picnic basket with a built-in battery." This idea is perfect for those who want to charge their devices on battery while on a picnic battery. The battery can be easily recharged using a portable charger or solar panel.
